issue.title: [Rust] PrimitiveArray<T> should support cast operations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3882](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3882). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It should be possible to cast PrimitiveArray<i32> to PrimitiveArray<f32> as one example.
